About Me

Let Me Tell You A Few Things...

BIO

Hello! My name is Alex Gunic I am a student of IT Škola. I'm 20 years old. Currently I am uneployed because I'm focusing all of my time to learn web developement and programming as best as I can. Previously I worked at a company called Hilti In Hungary as a cnc machine operator, but as you can see I realized that it's not what I want to do for a living so I started to learn web development.

School and Hobbies

I educated in CNC machine programming and operation at the school of Ivan Sarić Tehnička Škola in Subotica. I was one of the best students in terms of cnc programming knowledge in my class. I achieved 4th place on the national level competition of cnc programming. In my free time I go to the gym and I like to tinker with electrical and mechanical stuff.

A Few Other Things About Me

Currently I speak 3 different languages : Hungarian, Serbian and English. I'm always eager to learn new things that will benefit me later on. Even though I take my work seriously, I do have a good sense of humour.
